name: Garmin Low-Resolution Video
summary: Learn about .GLV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Many Garmin devices generate GLV files to accompany the MP4 files they create to store the high-resolution videos they record. Examples of devices include:
Garmin Dash Cam Mini and Mini 2
NOTE: Some device recording modes do not generate GLV files. For example, Garmin Dash Cam models generate GLV files in all recording modes except Travelapse.

instructions: You should not attempt to open GLV files. Instead, the Garmin mobile app loads GLV files when you browse the MP4 videos they accompany within the app. Examples of Garmin apps that support GLV files include VIRB, Drive, and dÄ“zl (Android and iOS).
